description:
Aiming for a high score on your AP European History exam? Look no further!  

The module contains over 125 simulated exam questions covering:
ancient European civilizations,
the Enlightenment,
the founding of the New World,
the French Revolution,
the first and second world war,
the modern era,
as well as general terminology necessary for success.

Each multiple-choice question is paired with a clear and thoughtful explanation and a highly-detailed Key Takeaway that summarizes the main learning point of the question, time period, or figure discussed, ensuring a comprehensive understanding of the material. Whether you are taking the test for the first time or striving to improve your score, Upward Mobility's AP European History Exam Prep software for Palm webOS is the perfect tool to help you succeed on the multiple choice portion of this competitive test. 


About the Author:

Katie McConnaughey is a freelance writer and editor based in Redmond, Washington. She received her BA in History from Mount Holyoke College in 2004.

Since that time, she has worked in the publishing industry, primarily on children's literature. Since going freelance in 2007, Katie has edited, written, proofread, and copyedited for a large variety of clients, including Simon & Schuster, Alloy Entertainment, becker&mayer! book producers, Symphony Space, diacriTech, the NYC Department of Health & Mental Hygiene, and a number of private clients.


About Upward Mobility

Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  We hire only expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and put all of our materials through a thorough review process.

We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
